content:
Greetings, folks!

I am writing to let you know about our upcoming 6.3 release, scheduled for early July. We anticipate that future releases will occur approximately every 3 months, moving forward. 

Get a preview of the upcoming improvements and features by checking the 6.3  milestone tag on the Dataverse repo.

Thanks to the Dataverse Community for your contributions, suggestions, and support!

--Ceilyn
